name: AMC DINE-IN Cherry Creek 8
outageDescription: We apologize for the inconvenience, but this theatre is temporarily closed. Please continue to check back here for updates.

attributes.name: Discount Tuesdays
attributes.description: All AMC Stubs members save big on tickets on Tuesday showtimes! Available at the box office, online or on our app. It’s just a weekly reminder of the many perks of being a member. (Discount varies by location. Surcharges for premium formats and special events. Exclusions apply.)

attributes.name: AMC Stubs A-List
attributes.description: Subscribe to A-List and see all the movies you want at this theatre for a low monthly fee.  Click to learn more and find other participating theatres.

attributes.name: Discount Matinees
attributes.description: Every day before 5pm, tickets are 30% less than the evening price!

attributes.name: AMC Signature Recliners
attributes.description: Kick back and enjoy the show from a luxurious AMC Signature Recliner.

attributes.name: Food & Drinks Online Ordering
attributes.description: Save time by purchasing your concessions online or in the AMC Theatres app.

attributes.name: Reserved Seating
attributes.description: Select your seat when you buy your tickets online, on our mobile app or at the theatre.

attributes.name: Dine-In Delivery to Seat
attributes.description: A fresh take on movies with a menu.  Choose from a selection of our chef's handcrafted favorites.  Order at concessions, then head to your reserved seat.  We'll deliver right to your table.

attributes.name: MacGuffins Bar
attributes.description: Enjoy delicious, adult-only, beverages at MacGuffins Bar. Beer and wine are always ready to be poured, and select theatres also offer premium spirits and AMC-crafted cocktails. For guests 21+ only.

attributes.name: AMC Stubs Member Wi-Fi
attributes.description: Select the AMC Stubs Member Wi-Fi network to sign in or join AMC Stubs. Become an Insider member for FREE to take advantage of FREE Wi-Fi access in the lobby, or upgrade to get even more at the movies.

attributes.name: Heated Recliners Available
attributes.description: Kick back and enjoy the show from a luxurious AMC Signature Recliner with optional heating in most auditoriums. Just look for the controller on your seat to select your preferred setting.

attributes.name: Digital Projection
attributes.description: This theatre features digital projection in all auditoriums.

attributes.name: Stadium Seating
attributes.description: This theatre features stadium seating in all auditoriums.

attributes.name: Assisted Listening Devices
attributes.description: This theatre offers assisted listening devices. Contact the guest services desk at the theatre for more information.

attributes.name: Wheelchair Access
attributes.description: This theatre is wheelchair-accessible in all auditoriums.

attributes.name: Age Policy for R-Rated Movies After 6 p.m.
attributes.description: This theatre does not allow children under the age of 6 to attend R-rated movies after 6 p.m. For R-rated showtimes starting before 6 p.m., children under the age of 6 may only be admitted with a parent or legal guardian. Please be prepared to show ID at the theatre.

attributes.name: No Outside Food and Beverage
attributes.description: Please refrain from bringing outside food and beverage items into the theatre.

attributes.name: Age Policy for R-Rated Films
attributes.description:
Under 17 requires accompanying parent or adult guardian (age 21 or older). Guests 25 years and under must show ID.
We restrict children younger than 6 from attending R-Rated films after 6pm to improve the experience for everyone. To bring your children younger than 6 to R-Rated films, please visit us before 6pm.

attributes.name: Pricing Notice
attributes.description: AMC reserves the right to exercise special pricing options for unique in-theatre experiences.

attributes.name: Refund Policy
attributes.description: No refunds after printed showtime.

attributes.name: Special Engagements
attributes.description: Some types of passes may be restricted for Special Engagements or New Releases and thus subject to a surcharge. Be sure to read the back of your pass for more details.

attributes.name: Closed Caption
attributes.description: Closed captioning devices available at this theatre.  Contact the guest services desk at the theatre for more information.

attributes.name: Audio Description
attributes.description: Audio Description devices available at this theatre. Contact the guest services desk at the theatre for more information.

attributes.name: Senior Pricing
attributes.description: If you're 60 or over, save on your movie ticket. Just show a valid ID at the box office.

attributes.name: Military Pricing
attributes.description: This location offers special military pricing. See box office for details. Must present a valid military ID.

attributes.name: Student Pricing
attributes.description: Every day, starting at 5pm, show your valid student ID at the box office and save on your ticket.

attributes.name: Coca-Cola Freestyle
attributes.description: Select from 100+ drink choices.  Whether you're craving a classic Coca-Cola, a Sprite Peach, or a Dasani Lime for your show,  we’ve got you covered.

attributes.name: Cherry Creek 8 Parking
attributes.description: The Cherry Creek Mall validates movie theatre parking.  On any day of the week, at any time of the day, on the day the ticket is printed, guests should bring their movie ticket (or concession) receipt to a Box Office associate.  Validation is good for the first three hours of the parking ticket, for any parking lot at the mall.

attributes.name: Mobile Ticketing
attributes.description: Skip the box office and go straight to the ticket drop with our mobile ticketing solution when buying tickets online.

attributes.name: Feature Fare
attributes.description: We're elevating the movie menu, offering better quality and variety with new loaded hot dogs, stone-fired flatbread pizzas, gluten-free snacks, and so much more!

attributes.name: Dine-In Delivery to Seat
attributes.description: A fresh take on movies with a menu. Choose from a selection of our chef's handcrafted favorites.  Order at concessions, then head to your reserved seat.  We'll deliver right to your table.

attributes.name: Heated Recliners
attributes.description: Take the incredible comfort of our AMC Signature Recliner, then add the power to warm it up! Use the controller on your seat to select your preferred settings.

attributes.name: RealD 3D
attributes.description: Feast your eyes on the mind-blowing RealD 3D experience at AMC. Using a new digital approach, you can watch movies with amazing depth and clarity, without sacrificing comfort.
